text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Yeah, it's a major feat alright. Maybe some of your viewers that have nothing to do because of your criminal mishandling of the COVID-19 crisis will see more of how much of a stupid asshole you really are. Enjoy prison when you're voted out of office, I hope you rot until you die
